title: Priority Skills for Commercial Art Program
subject: Commercial Art Program

364D1F56C5AB49808C619076CD91A50B.description:
Legal, Ethical & Safety Standards: Applying copyright laws, fair use, and digital
citizenship best practices, as well as safe studio practices in digital and physical work
environments.

53A6BE8AB9BE4D3E900B288CD014F6C9.description:
Media Arts Production: Organizing and producing digital media projects such as
motion graphics, promotional videos, or interactive presentations, often in collaboration
with peers or clients.

8A4BD010B1544EBB98DE000AF4D87E88.description:
Technical Drawing & Illustration: Producing hand-drawn and digital illustrations with
accuracy, creativity, and attention to detail, including figure drawing and perspective.

822B4AA8A4E245439390CE2D28031D73.description:
Project & Event Planning: Planning and executing visual components for events (e.g.,
promotional materials, space design), reflecting real-world applications of commercial
design.

B585C66BF8E54555B9E2DEECB76E9AE5.description:
Design Thinking & Problem Solving: Applying research, ideation, prototyping, and
revision cycles to solve real-world design problems creatively and effectively.

0BCF4B9F1D364360BDCBB20649D84EE6.description:
Logo and Identity Design: Developing branding elements, including logo systems,
using the design process from ideation to final presentation.

44903CFB30B045FE95BDEFA05CB55057.description:
Portfolio Development: Designing and curating professional digital and physical
portfolios that reflect technical skills, creativity, and personal branding for college and
career opportunities.

928AF077895D44D2885E72F48AB1AE15.description:
Visual Communication & Typography: Use of visual hierarchy, typeface selection,
and layout strategies to effectively convey messages and ideas in print and digital
formats.

304A25BBBAC74514ACD62095D3208CBF.description:
Digital Design Proficiency: Mastery of Adobe Creative Cloud (Photoshop, Illustrator,
InDesign, etc.) and other industry-standard software for digital illustration, layout,
typography, and image editing.
